General.Name: Raia Drogasil S.A
General.Description: Raia Drogasil S.A. engages in the retail sale of medicines, perfumery, personal care and beauty products, cosmetics, dermocosmetics, and specialty medicines in Brazil. It also markets its goods through telesales and call centers in the states of São Paulo, Tocantins, and Pernambuco. The company was founded in 1905 and is headquartered in São Paulo, Brazil.
General.Address: Av. Corifeu de Azevedo Marques, 3097, São Paulo, SP, Brazil, 05.339-900
